snippet: The federal authorities said Wednesday that they planned to sue Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County and his office over claims of civil rights violations, including the racial profiling of Latinos.
abstract: Justice Department plans to sue Maricopa County, Ariz, Sheriff Joseph Arpaio and his office over claims of civil rights violations, including the racial profiling of Latinos.
lead_paragraph: The federal authorities said Wednesday that they planned to sue Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County and his office over claims of civil rights violations, including the racial profiling of Latinos.

headline.main: Arizona: Sheriff to Face Civil Rights Suit Over Claims That Include Profiling
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Sheriff to Face Civil Rights Suit Over Claims That Include Profiling
